entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
